content: The secrets in Chapter 3 will have you continuing to fight hidden bosses, collecting the spirits of important captains, and taking you to an NPC hub.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 3 Secrets'.
The content is as follows:
The secrets in Chapter 3 will have you continuing to fight hidden bosses, collecting the spirits of important captains, and taking you to an NPC hub.
